import ums from './Users.module.css' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import userPhoto from '../../img/avatar.jpg' const User = ({users, unfollowThunk, followThunk}) => { return ( users.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status}
) ) } export default User
